Reviews.Title: It has lots of features and that you can down load picturs to your computer by WIFI
Reviews.Author: Mary Jonas
Reviews.Content: It's for my Boy Friend and he loves it....... He is always playing with it trying out all the features it has. He is very happy with it. Which makes me very happy....

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 8 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom and 1080p Full-HD Video
8 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket, Neck Strap & Belt Loop
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom and Full-HD Video + 7pc Bundle 8GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
